list.abs: ...于常识的“普通知识”（common knowledge）不受重视，但常人难以理解、更遑论掌握的所谓“深奥知识”（esoteric knowledge）却被赋予无上的权威。今日人人谈“金融海啸”色变，其实整个尖端金融业（cutting-edge fin.

...（exoteric writing），另一种则是“隐晦写作”（esoteric writing），后者只有那些训练有素的人经过反复琢磨才能领会。

in addition , Beijing regulators will consider more esoteric issues , such as whether Huiyuan's position as a nationally famous brand -- a status by the government -- would affected .此外，北京监管部门还会考虑更多的深层问题，例如政府授予汇源果汁的“中国名牌产品”地位是否会因为交易而受到影响。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Greek esōterikos, from esōterō, comparative of esō 'within', from es, eis 'into'. Compare with exoteric

entry.tran: 深奥的;难懂的;常人难以理解的
entry.def: If you describe something as esoteric, you mean it is known, understood, or appreciated by only a small number of people.

example.ex: ...a spoiled aristocrat with pretentious airs and esoteric tastes.
example.tran: 自命不凡、品位刁钻且被惯坏了的贵族成员

means.word_mean: 1. confined to and understandable by only an enlightened inner circle;
